item.title: Configure Dell PowerConnect PC5324
item.description: Configure Dell PowerConnect PC5324 Followed help from these sites https://www.stevejenkins.com/blog/2011/05/dell-powerconnect-5324-setup-tasks/ http://ninjix.blogspot.com/2013/03/dell-powerconnect-serial-console-on.html Tools to connect to console Minicom can be a problem if the env variable TERM is not set correctly. hit enter. then cntl-A then q then enter to exit minicom. screen Use the screen quit command (normally ctrl-A \). Steps taken Downloaded latest firmware
